ownerPhone.description: Owner's phone number in E.164 format (e.g. +15551234567) for deterministic SMS/call reminders

sidecarUrl.description: Base URL of the Twilio sidecar (default: http://localhost:8000). Use http://host.docker.internal:8000 for local Docker on macOS.

fromPhone.description: Twilio sender number in E.164 format (the bot's number, e.g. +18608514045). Passed as from_number to the sidecar.
